LanguageData.TR_namemessage: Male Title (Put None in both boxes to reset to default)
LanguageData.TR_namemessage2: Female Title (Remove to disable and use male title for both)
LanguageData.TR_changedtitle: Changed Title, save and load your colony to apply.
LanguageData.TR_selectorexplanation: Base Realm Type, default is Kingdom, all Empire does is change the King title to Emperor, Roman is based on Late Roman Empire
